root.name: Transworld Surf: Next Wave
root.description: OverviewTransworld Surf: Next Wave is a surfing game set at over 20 different international surf spots. The game has a serious side, but also a humorous side in that there are unlockable characters like King Neptune, and a Tiki Man. The game features single and multi-player gameplay. Single player consists of a career mode (Pro Tour), Single Session, and Free Surf. Multi-player is composed of King of the Wave, Free Surf, Competition, and Shark Tag.GameplayThere are basic and advanced maneuvers in the game. Basic moves include pumping, getting barreled, and snaps. Advanced moves break down into airs, floaters, special tricks, and flip tricks (not completely realistic to real life, although some surfers are currently getting closer to landing flip tricks). As in many extreme sports games there is a combo meter. The combo meter can be used to increase a score multiplier to increase the player's score.CharactersTS: NW lets you choose from the following 13 professional surfers:-Taj Burrow-Jason Collins-Tim Curran-Shane Dorian-Christian Fletcher-Andy Irons-Taylor Knox-Cory Lopez-Dan Malloy-Fred Patacchia-Rochelle BallardBonus CharactersTS: NW features bonus characters, below are a few examples:-The Sea Creature-Neptune-Lobster Man-Junior TupaLocationsSome of the locations in TS: NW include:-Kirra Point - Queensland, Australia-Fort Point - San Francisco, CA-Tavarua - Fiji-Hossegor - France-G Land - East Java, Indonesia-Huntington Beach - Huntington Beach, CA-Pipeline - North Shore, Oahu-Witches Rock - Costa Rice-Teahupoo - Tahiti-Todos Santos - Baja, Mexico-Antartica - South Pole
